languages.text: "Я не ставлю под сомнение твои методы, но сострадание к невинным — не слабость. Мы должны защищать Его возлюбленных подданных".

traits.locale_text: "Я не ставлю под сомнение твои методы, но сострадание к невинным — не слабость. Мы должны защищать Его возлюбленных подданных".

languages.text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
languages.original_text: "Я не ставлю под сомнение твои методы, но сострадание к невинным — не слабость. Мы должны защищать Его возлюбленных подданных".

traits.locale_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
"I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
"I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
"I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
"I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
"I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

languages.text: 「あなたの手段に異を唱えるつもりはない。でも、罪なき者への慈悲は弱さじゃないんだ。私たちは、皇帝陛下が深く愛される民を守らなきゃいけない」
languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの手段に異を唱えるつもりはない。でも、罪なき者への慈悲は弱さじゃないんだ。私たちは、皇帝陛下が深く愛される民を守らなきゃいけない」

languages.text: "Ich hinterfrage Eure Methoden nicht, doch Mitgefühl für die Unschuldigen ist keine Schwäche. Wir müssen die geliebten Untertanen des Imperators beschützen."
languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hinterfrage Eure Methoden nicht, doch Mitgefühl für die Unschuldigen ist keine Schwäche. Wir müssen die geliebten Untertanen des Imperators beschützen."

languages.text: « Sans vouloir remettre vos méthodes en question, je dois dire que la compassion envers les innocents n'est pas une marque de faiblesse. Nous nous devons de protéger les sujets bien-aimés de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

traits.locale_text: « Sans vouloir remettre vos méthodes en question, je dois dire que la compassion envers les innocents n'est pas une marque de faiblesse. Nous nous devons de protéger les sujets bien-aimés de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «No cuestiono sus métodos, pero sentir compasión por los inocentes no es ninguna debilidad. Debemos proteger a Sus bienamados súbditos».
languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

traits.locale_text: «No cuestiono sus métodos, pero sentir compasión por los inocentes no es ninguna debilidad. Debemos proteger a Sus bienamados súbditos».

languages.text: “我毫不怀疑你的做法，但同情无辜之人绝对不是弱点。我们必须保护好祂珍爱的子民。”
languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

traits.locale_text: “我毫不怀疑你的做法，但同情无辜之人绝对不是弱点。我们必须保护好祂珍爱的子民。”

languages.text: "Yöntemlerini sorgulamıyorum ama masumlara merhamet etmek zayıflık değildir. İmparator'un kıymetli tebaasını korumalıyız."
languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Yöntemlerini sorgulamıyorum ama masumlara merhamet etmek zayıflık değildir. İmparator'un kıymetli tebaasını korumalıyız."

languages.original_text: "I do not question your methods, but compassion for the innocent is not a weakness. We must protect His dearly loved subjects."
